name: Blobbers Run!
storyline:
Blobbers Run! begins in the enchanting Moonlight Forest, the birthplace of all Blobbers. For decades, these harmless creatures have been hunted by Level 1 Adventurers, seeking easy prey for their training. The Blobs, skittish and gentle by nature, have lived in fear, always on the lookout for the next adventurer.

One fateful day, a particularly brave blob shares a rumour with the others—a tale of a mystical place where Blobs can live in peace and happiness. This paradise, said to be ruled by the benevolent Blob King, promises safety and joy for all Blobs. Inspired by the hope of a better life, the blobs decide to embark on a grand journey.

Thus begins the great adventure of Blobbers Run!, where blobs from all corners of Moonlight Forest set out to find this fabled sanctuary. Along the way, they must navigate various challenges, avoid the ever-present threat of adventurers. Their journey is not just a quest for a new home, but a testament to their resilience and hope for a brighter future.
summary: Blobbers Run! is a cute bubbly infinite runner for mobile android. Join adorable slimy characters as they set off on a journey to find their paradise - The Blob Kingdom.
